attributes.action: Abolish the Standing Charges on Domestic Household Bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do we think the Utilty Companies are ripping the public off?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nostandingcharge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
